languages.text: "Несмотря на все недостатки статуса кво, он позволяет нам выживать последние десять тысячелетий. Значит, он эффективен".
"As flawed as the status quo is, it has helped us survive for the past ten millennia. Therefore, it is effective."
languages.original_text: "Несмотря на все недостатки статуса кво, он позволяет нам выживать последние десять тысячелетий. Значит, он эффективен".

traits.locale_text: "As flawed as the status quo is, it has helped us survive for the past ten millennia. Therefore it is efficient."
"As flawed as the status quo is, it has helped us survive for the past ten millennia. Therefore it is efficient."
"As flawed as the status quo is, it has helped us survive for the past ten millennia. Therefore, it is efficient."
"As flawed as the status quo is, it has helped us survive for the past ten millennia. Therefore, it is efficient."
"As flawed as the status quo is, it has helped us survive for the past ten millennia. Therefore, it is effective."
"As flawed as the status quo is, it has helped us survive for the past ten millennia. Therefore, it is effective."

languages.text: 「現状に不備があるのと同様に、過去10回の千年紀に渡って、それが我々の生存を支えていた。故に、それは効率的なのだ」
languages.original_text: "As flawed as the status quo is, it has helped us survive for the past ten millennia. Therefore, it is effective."

traits.locale_text: 「現状に不備があるのと同様に、過去10回の千年紀に渡って、それが我々の生存を支えていた。故に、それは効率的なのだ」

languages.text: “尽管现状存在缺陷，但在过去的一万年里，正是这些规则让我们存活了下来。因此，目前的规则是有效的。”
languages.original_text: "As flawed as the status quo is, it has helped us survive for the past ten millennia. Therefore, it is effective."

traits.locale_text: “尽管现状存在缺陷，但在过去的一万年里，正是这些规则让我们存活了下来。因此，目前的规则是有效的。”

languages.text: "So fehlerhaft der Status quo sein mag, er hat uns die letzten zehn Jahrtausende überleben lassen. Also ist er effizient."
languages.original_text: "As flawed as the status quo is, it has helped us survive for the past ten millennia. Therefore, it is effective."

traits.locale_text: "So fehlerhaft der Status quo sein mag, er hat uns die letzten zehn Jahrtausende überleben lassen. Also ist er effizient."

languages.text: « Si imparfait soit-il, le statu quo nous a permis de survivre ces dix derniers millénaires. Preuve que c'est une stratégie efficace. »
languages.original_text: "As flawed as the status quo is, it has helped us survive for the past ten millennia. Therefore, it is effective."

traits.locale_text: « Si imparfait soit-il, le statu quo nous a permis de survivre ces dix derniers millénaires. Preuve que c'est une stratégie efficace. »

languages.text: «Por deficiente que sea el statu quo, nos ha ayudado a sobrevivir durante los últimos diez milenios. Por tanto, su eficacia es innegable».
languages.original_text: "As flawed as the status quo is, it has helped us survive for the past ten millennia. Therefore, it is effective."

traits.locale_text: «Por deficiente que sea el statu quo, nos ha ayudado a sobrevivir durante los últimos diez milenios. Por tanto, su eficacia es innegable».

languages.text: "Statüko ne kadar kusurlu olursa olsun, geçtiğimiz on bin yıl boyunca hayatta kalmamızı sağladı. Efektif olduğu kesin."
languages.original_text: "As flawed as the status quo is, it has helped us survive for the past ten millennia. Therefore, it is effective."

traits.locale_text: "Statüko ne kadar kusurlu olursa olsun, geçtiğimiz on bin yıl boyunca hayatta kalmamızı sağladı. Yani efektif olduğu kesin."
